comment.body:
Let's just block `://trk.*run^$document` right off the bat. Absolutely *nothing* good could result from such a URL pattern.

We should also block `residencepluck.com` and the other 8,000 domains hosted on its malware IPs: https://securitytrails.com/domain/residencepluck.com/dns

comment.body:
@115dkk

> 1. I have the same problem with all galleries (bulletin boards) on a site called dcinside. The gallery I specified in the link is just one example.

Can be reproduced with Microsoft default anti-virus.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/bc6566a7-86fb-483a-b911-88c22795573d)

</details> 


> 2. intermittently, when I try to access, refresh, enter a post/comment, etc., it just loads pointlessly and never completes, as if the browser is lagging.
> 3. In that state, I can't select any links, try to refresh again, or even hit back button to go back until I get to the new tab home.

Please remove all anti-virus programs except Microsoft Defender.

> 4. like 'namu wiki', I have a suspicion that the company is intentionally making the site difficult to use if you have adblock enabled.

Did you mean dcinside?
